entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
